text: 11.23 Apo 16.23, 1 Ko 15.10 Kɨli Klays bɨ wog gɨñeb ne okok akaŋ? Yad Klays bɨ wog gɨñeb ne teplep yɨbɨl olap mɨdebin. Yad mɨñɨl bɨ sawl sek takaw sawl yɨbɨl agup tek agebin. Yad wog kɨles gɨl, mɨŋel adek keke dɨpin, bɨ anɨb okok wog sɨkol gɨl, mɨŋel sɨkol dɨpal. Bɨ ogɨnap yɨp ñɨn kuŋay yɨbɨl nag lɨpal, bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop ñɨn nokom nokom nag lɨpal. Bɨ ogɨnap yɨp kɨles tɨmel gɨl yɨbɨl tapɨn pakɨlak, bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop sɨkol yɨbɨl pakɨlak. Ñɨn kuŋay yɨbɨl kumdam nab lɨl ownek.
